subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Harvey outpitched the postseason veteran Jon Lester and threw seven and two-thirds strong innings, holding the Cubs to two runs and leading the Mets to 4-2 victory.
snippet: Harvey outpitched the postseason veteran Jon Lester and threw seven and two-thirds strong innings, holding the Cubs to two runs and leading the Mets to 4-2 victory.
